name: gps-time
description: Small utility to convert times between GPS epoch (midnight January 6, 1980) and Unix epoch (midnight January 1, 1970), taking into account leap seconds.

scripts.push-publish: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run push-publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run push-publish
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run push-publish
scripts.bump: npm outdated && npm update && npm audit fix && npm test || echo 'Package up to date'

author: David Calhoun
